prod.path: Home/Sneakers/Air Jordan/1/Mid/Jordan 1 Mid Tropical Twist Igloo
prod.desciption:
The Jordan 1 Mid Tropical Twist Igloo adds vibrant hue to the Mid model.

The Jordan 1 Mid Tropical Twist Igloo features a mix of teal blue, black, and white tumbled leather. The part of the sneaker that gives light to the its name is its teal heel and collar combo. Moving toward the foot of the shoe, a black and white toe box adds contrast to the bright sneaker.

The Jordan 1 Mid Tropical Twist Igloo released in June of 2021 for $115.
